title: ColorOS 12.1: All of the top new features, functions, and extras [Video]
content:
Oppo has grown almost exponentially over the past few years, and although once a tough sell, ColorOS 12 and 12.1 have toned down the iOS influence and the result is a nice alternative full of excellent features.

The post ColorOS 12.1: All of the top new features, functions, and extras [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A tuned flavor specifically for Oppo smartphones, ColorOS 12.1 comes on the Find X5 Pro and includes some notable new features and functions.
